subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Gennady Golovkin, the World Boxing Association and International Boxing Organization middleweight champion, will fight Willie Monroe Jr. on May 16 at the Forum in Inglewood, Calif.
snippet: Gennady Golovkin, the World Boxing Association and International Boxing Organization middleweight champion, will fight Willie Monroe Jr. on May 16 at the Forum in Inglewood, Calif.
